    • Method Detail

      • insertRequestToDB

        public void insertRequestToDB(java.lang.String id,
                              java.time.LocalDate date,
                              java.time.LocalTime time,
                              java.lang.String park,
                              int numOfVisitors,
                              java.lang.String type,
                              int status)
        this method sends to server parameters for insert to request table in DB
        Parameters:
        id - - of the asks
        date - - current date of request
        time - - current time of request
        park - - the name of the park we want to request something
        numOfVisitors - - number of visitors of casual traveler
        type - - type of request
        status - - some options: -1 the request waiting for handle, 0 - the request was denied 1-the request was approved

      • checkIfApproveRequest

        public int checkIfApproveRequest(java.lang.String id,
                                 java.lang.String type)
        this method sends to server id and type of request and check if the request was approved or not
        Parameters:
        id - -of the ask of request
        type - - of request
        Returns:
        0 if the request wasn't approved and 1 if the request was approved

      • getRequestsTravellerOfEnterPark

        public void getRequestsTravellerOfEnterPark(java.lang.String wantedpark)
        this method sends to server the name of park and get the parameters of request table
        Parameters:
        wantedpark - - for presenting in request table to department employee

      • changeStatusForCasualTraveller

        public void changeStatusForCasualTraveller(int status,
                                           java.lang.String id,
                                           java.lang.String park)
        this method sends to server parameters for update in "enter park" request of casual traveller
        Parameters:
        status - -the right status we want to update (0/1)
        id - - of asks of request
        park- - relevant park

      • gotMessage

        public void gotMessage(java.lang.String[] msg)
        gotMesage from server - for handle all messages that sent there is cases of got messages - and handle by switch case and updates variables there is case of "done" that we don't need to do something - the action accrued in DB
        Parameters:
        msg - - the massage that we got from server
